title: Exploring Techniques for Detecting GAN-Generated Images
description: Developed a robust technique to detect GAN-generated images by identifying unique artifacts that are not typically present in authentic images. Applied Fast Fourier Transform (FFT) to the RGB channels of images to extract frequency domain features. Leveraged a neural network to classify images based on these features, effectively highlighting distinct patterns of GAN-generated content

title: HPASS Rentals Management System
description: Developed administrative and owner dashboards for data visualization and trend analysis. Integrated multimedia upload capabilities for enhanced communication and transparency. Established an automated chatbot for 24/7 customer service support, improving response time. Designed a robust API gateway to manage communication between microservices, ensuring seamless interaction and load balancing.

title: Steel Defect Detection and Classification
description: Provided an effective and robust approach to detect metal defects using Semantic Segmentation (UNet architecture) and classify the same using CNN, and created web application for the same using FLASK API
